Section.Catchline: Contracts with counties, municipalities, or licensed private security agencies.

SectionBody.Text: The Department of Management Services may contract with any county, municipality, or licensed private security agency to provide and maintain the security of state-owned property, and the safety and security of occupants and visitors thereof, pursuant to ss. 281.02-281.08 upon such terms as the department may deem to be in the best interest of the state.
